name: Together in the Tundra
description:
There is a playable version in this link Together in the Tundra (Playable) by CodedCole (itch.io)

You are a survivor in a tundra wasteland just trying to survive as hostile conditions freeze everything you can see and other survivors compete for the loot.

Stay close to your teammate and don't lose him, body-warmth can help you survive -20 C (and some coats to of course)

Good Luck! Have Fun! Don't Die!
